description: Nick just found out that his boyfriend cheated on him with their personal trainer. They were discovered by Nick's friend, Brett in the steam room at their gym. Brett wasted no time telling Nick what a dick his boyfriend was and together, Nick and Brett, came up with a hot revenge video to get back at Nick's cheating boyfriend. Watch in awe as Nick deep throats Brett's huge dick. We don't know what Nick's ex thinks about this video but who cares, this video is hot!
title: Booty Partners
